## Simple Plot

```{r load, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# load library
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r gg-intro}
# simple plot
ggplot(mtcars) +
  geom_point(aes(disp, mpg))
```

## Addition Function

```{r func}
add <- function(a, b) {
  a + b
}
```
